TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class StateBag : System.Collections.IDictionary, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StateBag extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class StateBag Implements IDictionary, IStateManager
public ref class StateBag sealed : System::Collections::IDictionary, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 管理 ASP.NET 服务器控件（包括页面）的视图状态。

span.span: Manages the view state of ASP.NET server controls, including pages.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页或控件的视图状态是累积的属性值或视图，该页面或控件。View state for a page or control is the cumulative property values, or view, of that page or control. 你可以访问通过此类属性。You can access this class through the property. 控件可以还将基本状态信息存储在控件状态，但信息不是存储为对象。Controls can also store essential state information in control state, but that information is not stored as a object. 此类是所有的 HTML 和 Web 服务器控件的主存储机制。This class is the primary storage mechanism for all HTML and Web server controls. 它将属性/值对存储为与控件关联的字符串。It stores attribute/value pairs as strings associated with the control. 它跟踪对这些属性的更改之后才方法执行页请求，并将所做的更改保存到的页面的或控件的视图状态。It tracks changes to these attributes only after the method is executed for a page request, and saves the changes to the page's or control's view state. 此类实现一个字典，并可以向其添加项或从中删除项，就像任何字典对象。This class implements a dictionary, and you can add items to it or remove items from it as you would any dictionary object. 有关详细信息数据集合，如字典，请参阅[集合和数据结构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。For more information about data collections, such as dictionaries, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个复合`Label`具有控件`Text`和`FontSize`属性。The following code example demonstrates a composite `Label` control that has `Text` and `FontSize` properties. 这些属性都保存到并从视图中检索状态时在控件上调用方法。These properties are saved to and retrieved from view state when the method is called on the control. [!code-csharp[SysWebUIControlViewState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/CS/controlviewstate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SysWebUIControlViewState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/VB/controlviewstate.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此成员是保存和检索的控件或网页的视图状态值的最简单方法。Using this member is the simplest way to save and retrieve view-state values for a control or a page. 如果某个项不存储在对象时设置此属性，其键/值对添加到集合。If an item is not already stored in the object when you set this property, its key/value pair is added to the collection. 如果将此属性设置为`null`之前在项上调用方法，则将删除从对象。If you set this property to `null` before the method is called on an item, it is removed from the object. 否则为当此属性设置为`null`密钥将保存，以便能够跟踪项的视图状态。Otherwise, when you set this property to `null` the key is saved to allow tracking of the item's view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个属性，将其名称和值保存到的键/值对为属性。The following code example demonstrates a property that saves its name and value as a key/value pair to the property. 属性是的一个实例类。The property is an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[SysWebUIControlViewState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/CS/controlviewstate.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SysWebUIControlViewState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SysWebUIControlViewState/VB/controlviewstate.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取表示 对象中的项的键集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of keys representing the items in the object.
The collection of keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些密钥是控件属性的名称。These keys are the names of the control properties. 例如，如果你创建`BGColor`属性`Table`你自定义，控件`BGColor`该属性表示在此集合中创建条目你`Table`控件。For example, if you created a `BGColor` property on a `Table` control that you customized, a `BGColor` entry is created in this collection representing that property on your `Table` control. 这些密钥对应的名称对象存储在当前页或服务器控件的集合。These keys correspond to the names of the objects stored in the collection for the current page or server control. 可以循环访问此集合使用方法。You can iterate over this collection using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. param.name: state
param.span: 表示要还原的 状态的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the state to restore.

summary.span: 还原以前保存的 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Restores the previously saved view state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法还原视图状态信息对象从已保存的上一个页面请求方法。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method. 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 你可以重写此方法，以控制自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。You can override this method to control how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance object System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState() cil managed
Function SaveViewState () As Object Implements IStateManager.SaveViewState

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后，对 对象的更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 的视图状态更改的对象。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state of the .

returns.span: 如果没有更改，或 中没有 元素，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there are no changes, or there are no elements in the , this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值会自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1). 视图状态保存时，此字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在 HTML`Hidden`元素。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `Hidden` element. 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写此方法并修改你的服务器控件的提高效率属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)和[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 使 对象跟踪其状态的变更，以便该对象可在请求中一直留存。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its state so that it can be persisted across requests.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Values { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取存储在 对象中的视图状态值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the view-state values stored in the object.
The collection of view-state values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是所有包含的值的集合指定的页或控件中的对象。This is a collection that contains the values for all the objects in the specified page or control. 你可以通过使用循环访问这些值方法。You can iterate through these values by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Web.UI.StateBag#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Web.UI.StateBag/CS/gotocs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[Web.UI.StateBag#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Web.UI.StateBag/VB/gotovb.aspx#2)]
